column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

There was a larger yarding of 170 cattle at Powranna on Tuesday with about 75% being cows.
Trade cattle sold to similar market with yearling steers making 302c to 368c and heifers 300c to 358c.

There were approximately 130 cows with a big percentage being unfinished types. Heavy beef cows were around 26c cheaper making 274c to 296c, leaner 220c to 270c, lighter 150c to 248c and very lean 90c to 120c/ kg liveweight.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
